argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmmul.x | |- X = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | nmmul.n | |- N = ( norm ` R ) |
| 3 |  | nmmul.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( AbsVal ` R ) = ( AbsVal ` R ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_nrgabv | |- ( R e. NrmRing -> N e. ( AbsVal ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 1, 3 | #P_abvmul | |- ( ( N e. ( AbsVal ` R ) /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) x. ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( R e. NrmRing /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) x. ( N ` B ) ) ) |
